pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
pre_caption: This video presents a breathtaking aerial scenery shot of a massive, snow-covered mountain. The camera glides smoothly alongside the rugged, icy peak. This dynamic movement offers a close-up view of the mountain's dramatic rock faces and glaciers against a backdrop of blue sky and swirling clouds.
